other_tests.findings: A missense mutation, Arg531Gly, was identified in all affected individuals but was absent in 150 unrelated individuals.

other_tests.date: Resting ECG noted at age 2; Preexcited atrial fibrillation at age 10.
other_tests.findings: Ventricular preexcitation diagnosed on the basis of a short PR interval (<120 ms) and widened QRS interval (>110 ms).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Paroxysms of atrial fibrillation were observed with progression leading to high-grade conduction disease.

other_tests.findings: Normal left ventricular (LV) function, interventricular septal thickness of 9 mm, and maximal LV free wall thickness of 11 mm.
